name: mri_synthsr
description: Implementation of SynthSR that generates a synthetic 1mm MP-RAGE from a scan of any contrast and resolution.

inputs.description: Image(s) to super-resolve. Can be a path to an image or to a folder.
inputs.name: Input

inputs.description: Output(s), i.e., synthetic 1mm MP-RAGE(s). Must be a folder if input is a folder.
inputs.name: Output

inputs.description: Use this flag for CT scans in Hounsfield scale, it clips intensities to [0,80].
inputs.name: CT Flag

inputs.description: Use this flag to disable unsharp masking.
inputs.name: Disable Sharpening Flag

inputs.description: Use this flag to disable flipping augmentation at test time.
inputs.name: Disable Flipping Flag

inputs.description: Use model for low-field scans (e.g., acquired with Hyperfine's Swoop scanner).
inputs.name: Low Field Flag

inputs.description: Number of cores to be used. Default is 1.
inputs.name: Threads

inputs.description: Enforce running with CPU rather than GPU.
inputs.name: CPU Flag

author: FreeSurfer Developers
